Main Topic

Report Usage

To add these reports to your project's site, add the following snippet to your POM:

+---+ build plugins plugin groupIdcom.googlecode.googlecode-changes-maven-plugin/groupId artifactIdgooglecode-changes-maven-plugin/artifactId version$pluginVersion/version /plugin /plugins /build +---+
